duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing all aspects of technical operations including building, software installation, upgrades, patching, security, system responsiveness, scaling, troubleshooting, reliability, and monitoring.
Resolving complex problems using deep technical knowledge and experience.
Providing support to tier 2 application issues as needed.
Managing and overseeing infrastructure, operations, and maintenance including scheduling, facilitating meetings, and material preparation.
Participating in and reviewing project plans and schedules.
Reporting and tracking open issues and action items in Jira.
Providing status and statistical reporting for the weekly status and monthly deep dives.
Maintaining AWS spreadsheet which captures storage and instance information per environment.
